main event: A UFO sighting of an oblong silver object was reported in Santa Barbara, California on June 21, 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes,The object was still in sight when reported,The sun was shining on the object,The sighting was confirmed as a balloon observation,The report included notes from the Intelligence Officer Guy Renfroe.
sighted object: oblong silver object in the sky
witness description: Mr. Stanley Guthrie, a public accountant
